page.title: 19Norwich Prison(continued)
page.content: in over-crowded conditions in cells ranged along the traditional open landings. Because of over-crowding and man-power shortages conditions are less comfortable than in the rest of the prison.Educational services and training programmes are often curtailed and the emphasis is on supervision. Once sentenced the prisoner is placed in a category from A(High Risk) to D(No security risk) and assigned to a prison. Such a prison is the Britannia Block which holds 200 category inmates.
